name: Elegant Calendar Lite – WordPress Events Calendar Plugin
author: wphobby

sections.description:
Elegant Calendar make you can easily create and manage events calendar on your website. This plugin comes with built in options that you can use to generate different calendar layout as you needed.

Presentation

Premium | Demo | Documentation

WORDPRESS EVENT CALENDAR

Elegant Calendar has been created according to trending design methods and latest technology with attractive design based on practical concept of design.

We gathered all features of event calendar as you desire (Pro Version) and many other useful options which are practical in real world!
Using Elegant Calendar Lite, you can create different single or recurring events and show them in frontend of your WordPress website using many modern skins and styles.

Just getting started? Read through the Documentation to get set up.
Looking for additional features like recurring events, ticket sales, user-submitted events, automatic imports, and more?
Check out Elegant Calendar Pro.

PLUGIN CUSTOMIZE

Elegant Calendar is built to work out of the box. Simply install the plugin, configure your settings, and start creating events in minutes.

Want to add your personal touch? Use Elegant Calendar as the foundation for customization. Personalize to your heart’s content with the help of a skeleton stylesheet, partial template overrides, template tags, hooks and filters, careful documentation, and a library of free extensions.
Whether your vision is big or small, you’re in good company. Hundreds of thousands of small businesses, musicians, venues, restaurants, and non-profits are publishing and promoting their in-person and virtual events with Elegant Calendar. Our plugins have also been scaled to work on large networks for Fortune 100 companies, universities, and government institutions.

Premium Features:

  • Easily create calendar events
  • Event locations & organizers
  • Event list view
  • Event month view
  • Event week view
  • Event day view
  • Event search
  • Event types
  • Event custom color
  • Event feature images
  • Show/Hide comments in single event page
  • Event calendar shortcodes generator
  • Show/Hide events option for search bar
  • Events filtering options
  • Already tested on the major theme frameworks such as Avada, Divi, Enfold, Genesis, and many more
  • Full responsive from mobile to tablet and desktop devices
  • Show event content only for registered users
  • Change event visibility and hide them in shortcodes
  • Multiple Category Search option
  • Shortcode to display users events
  • Booking event shortcode
  • Download-able file feature
  • Custom event fields
  • Show Normal Label
  • Event Management System
  • Slugs/Permalinks Options
  • Breadcrumbs
  • Event Link Options
  • Translation-ready messages
  • Custom CSS
  • Advanced categorizing and filtering options
  • Full search bar for all shortcodes
  • Shortcode Creator
  • Add Event in the form of wizard
  • Add shortcode in the form of wizard
  • Multiple color skins
  • Search bar Shortcode
  • Multiple Organizers
  • Multiple Locations
  • Multisite Ready
  • WPML Ready
  • SEO Ready
  • SEO Schema
  • Developer Friendly
  • Shortcode For Page Builders
  • Search Bar Feature
  • Additional Organizers
  • Sort Additional Organizers
  • Organizer & Other Organizers Description
  • Multiple Event Location

Elegant Calendar Pro Version

Like Elegant Calendar Free Version? Here’s you can get Elegant Calendar pro version and have more features.

Do you like Elegant Calendar?

Don’t hesitate to give your feedback. It will help making the plugin better. Other contributions (such as new translations or helping other users on the support forum) are welcome !

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Elegant Calendar from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
What is the requirements to use Elegant Calendar?

Minimum Requirements
WordPress version 4.0 or greater.
PHP version 5.4 or greater.

Recommended Requirements

Latest version of WordPress.
PHP 5.4 or greater.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.4 2021-03-08

  • Update – Display plugin welcome page after activation

Version 1.0.3 2021-03-07

  • Fix – Set event default date and time
  • Fix – Main calendar style css issues

Version 1.0.2 2021-03-06

  • Fix – Set event default date and time
  • Fix – PHP Notice of value not set

Version 1.0.1 2021-03-03

  • Update – Calendar global settings page
  • Update – Calendar events editor page

Version 1.0.0 2021-02-23

Initial release
